biotools.summary:
Inference and Likelihood of Intermediate Metabolite Formation.

XenoNet Web provides prediction web services for small molecule biochemistry. XenoNet Web can be used by medicinal chemists and biologists to make predictions about the human in vivo metabolism and reactivity of small molecules.
